basic.description: This course offers a presentation and discussion of current topics in the field of dietetics and health care; dissemination and discussion of novel concepts and applications in the practice of dietetics; review of methods in nutritional assessment; and review and completion of core competencies expected of entry-level dietitians.
basic.subject: DIE
basic.title: Current Topics in Dietetics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: DIE 5248. Corequisite: Admission to Dietetics Internship Program (requires Internship Director's permission to enroll).
